page.title: 08EVENTS,SAUNDERSFOOT
page.content: October 17th,1984. It was a Sunday morning at 7.45a.m. Everything was quiet until there was a big explosion. I thought it was Pendine guns practising so I didnt think anything of it.I got dressed ready for church. When we got there Mr. Davies told my dad about the gas explosion, and he said that the local V.G. store had just blown up into smoke and there was rubble all over the place.When we came back from church we tried to go down the village to see all of the mess, but when we got there the policeman sent us back through Coppet Hall and past the church. Now they say that the Cambrian Hotel may fall down and if it doesnt they will have to demolish it.All of this gas explosion will cost Â£1,000,000. Meinir Rees Age 11yrs.
